title: Womens Dress
title_original: Sleevey Wonders Women’s 3/4 Length Slip-On Lace Sleeves – Sheer Reversible Arm Cover Up, Cooling Shrug Bolero for Dresses

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #192,190 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #173 in Women's Shrug Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Shrugs

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant solution for a sleeveless dress!
items.body: Nice quality lace that looked elegant under my sleeveless black dress. I wore it for a special event, and I am highly satisfied. The large fit as expected. Good value for the money. Read more
items.author: Kathleen S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great.
items.body: It looks great under lots of tops and dresses. Feels really nice. Read more
items.author: Mary L Armstrong

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice, color too yellow
items.body: This is a nice piece but the color is too yellow. Returning Read more
items.author: kiree

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must for your wardrobe, if you have batwing or flabby arms
items.body: This has been a lifesaver for me. I’m able to wear some tops that I normally wouldn’t with my batwing arms. Love it! Read more
items.author: Leona M Byrd

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Arms are tight
items.body: A little tight but very nice Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing invention!
items.body: Where have these been my whole life!! It seems every shirt, blouse or dress I buy has short, capped sleeves or are sleeveless. I have big, flabby arms so these are amazing to wear underneath. They do not look like aftermarket add-ons! Super comfortable, true to size, and undetectable under clothing. These are reversible to show the neckline or the plunge in v-shape to only show sleeves. Read more
items.author: Lana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my favs
items.body: Love this to cover my upper arms. Adds a sexy flare to any tank top. I wish it was available in more colors. Read more
items.author: Penny

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Already love it!
items.body: I just received it and tried it on right away and I am so impressed with this product! I saw some mixed reviews on the quality of the lace but a lot of the bad reviews are old so I’m thinking there have been improvements. This product looks and feels high quality and fits perfectly. I ordered based on their size chart. I am 5 foot 7 inches and about 190 lbs and the large fits like a glove. I plan on ordering more styles as needed but for now I’m excited to rock the lace sleeves! Read more
items.author: Amanda M.

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
